content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

create or ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_calender as 
begin 

if object_id('silver.calendar')is not null 
    drop EXTERNAL table silver.calendar  
    
create EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar 
    with(
        LOCATION = 'silver_layer/calendar',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file
    )as 
    select * from bronze.calendar  

end;
